akn:section.akn:heading: Improvements in market information and public accountability in higher education

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Data dissemination The Secretary shall make available the data collected pursuant to subsection (a). Such data shall be available in a form that permits the review and comparison of the data submissions of individual institutions of higher education. Such data shall be presented in a form that is easily understandable and allows parents and students to make informed decisions based on the costs for typical full-time undergraduate students.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Promotion of the Department of Education Federal student financial aid website

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Promotion of the Department of Education Federal student financial aid website The Secretary shall display a link to the Federal student financial aid website of the Department in a prominent place on the homepage of the Department’s website.
